label: ChatCompletionSchema
description: Object defining the custom schema the model will use to structure its output.

fields.label: Additional Properties
fields.tooltip: Controls whether it is allowable for an object to contain additional keys / values that were not defined in the JSON Schema. Default is false.

fields.label: Properties
fields.tooltip: A JSON-formatted string that defines the output schema's properties and constraints for the model.

fields.label: Required
fields.tooltip: An array of the property names that are required to be part of the model's response. All properties must be included for structured outputs.

fields.label: Type
fields.tooltip: Type of schema representation. Usually 'object'. Default is 'object'.
